product_description: Vanicream Shave Cream is non-lathering formula has been specially developed for those who need, or want, to avoid common chemical irritants found in ordinary shave creams. short_description: VANILLA CASHMERE FRAGRANCE: Features rich notes of whipped vanilla, soft musk, and cozy caramel for a warm, nuzzly scent
CASHMERE SMOOTH COMPLEX: eos Shave Oil is made with a moisture-rich blend of shea butter, cocoa butter, and argan butter to soften, hydrate, and cushion skin as you shave
SKINCARE-LEVEL HYDRATION: Coconut oil boosts glide, jojoba seed oil helps minimize post-shave bumps, and glycerin draws in moisture for smooth, soft skin

product_description: eos Vanilla Cashmere Shave Oil delivers a smooth, comfortable shave with a warm scent of whipped vanilla, soft musk, and cozy caramel. This lightweight oil-serum transforms shaving into a skincare ritual, delivering a close, cushioned shave and leaving skin cashmere smooth. Infused with a moisture-rich blend of shea butter, cocoa butter, coconut oil, and glycerin, the formula cushions and glides to help prevent irritation, nicks, and razor burn. Designed for sensitive skin and bikini area-approved. Complete your routine by layering with Vanilla Cashmere Body Wash, Body Lotion, and Body Mist for a long-lasting scent experience.
